dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4722 IH: Urban Indian Health Parity Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ruiz (for himself and Mr. Bacon) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require a Federal medical assistance percentage of 100 percent for urban Indian organizations, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Urban Indian Health Parity Act.

section.header: Full Federal medical assistance percentage for urban Indian organizations
section.text: Section 1905(b) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1396d(b)) is amended by inserting after by an Indian tribe or tribal organization (as defined in section 4 of the Indian Health Care Improvement Act) the following: , or through an urban Indian organization (as defined in section 4 of such Act) pursuant to a grant or contract with the Indian Health Service under the Indian Health Care Improvement Act.
